import { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; import NavBar from "../NavBar/NavBar"; export const Experience = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [name, setName] = useState([]); const [position, setPosition] = useState([]); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState([]); const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(["present"]); const [des, setDes] = useState([]); const onQuerySubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (name.length < 3 || position.length < 3) { alert("Company name must contain at least 3 letter"); } else { const companyDetails = { name: name, startDate: startDate, endDate: endDate, Position: position, Description: des, }; const currData = [companyDetails, ...storedData]; localStorage.setItem("Company", JSON.stringify(currData)); history.replace("/experience"); } }; return ( <>
